website_summaries.verdict: Professional athletes and dedicated fitness enthusiasts will find the investment in this high-powered motor to be well worth the extra price.
pros: Has one of the strongest motors of all treadmills, making it the model of choice for marathoners, sprinters, and other elite athletes training several times a week
cons: Deck is fixed at a slight incline, so you'll be walking or running on an incline whether you want to or not

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treadmill BUT check the shipping box and factory calibration and lubrication
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill itself is great. Nothing new to add to other reviews. Three things though: 1. Check the box before you accept delivery. First box from Amazon was crushed and ripped open. Refused delivery, contacted customer service, second box great. 2. Belt completely unlubricated from the factory. Check and lube before you use the treadmill. 3. Factory roller size set to wrong diameter in computer (6.4"). Manual also incorrectly says 6.38". The treadmill has a 6.75" roller. Set it to correct size if indicated speed and distance matters to you. A too-small roller setting will make the treadmill too fast for indicated speed.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great for smallish spaces, holds up very well
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these at home, and after years of great operation and excellent compact footprint, I ordered one for my son. He has a basement workout area, with a normal basement ceiling, and his height (6+ ft) is no problem. He lifts the platform up when he is not using it, so it doesn't feel imposing in the room, and it works as well there as ours still does at our house. My husband does the occasional maintenance on the tread, I think it is less often than once a year, but probably based on mileage. Great feeling surface to run on.
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth Dawson

customer_reviews.title: The extensive research paid off
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was better than expected - the ABF driver actually helped us get the HUGE box into the house. Once we had some help getting it down a short flight of stairs, it took about 60 minutes to assemble the handles. Assembly was not difficult mind you, just quite a few pieces and steps to work thru. The treadmill's now had several hours of operation and works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: TechyNerd

customer_reviews.title: Very good treadmill. Lots of nice features but not at ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good treadmill. Lots of nice features but not at all complicated and runs very quiet. Pulling the emergency cord really does stop it almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far, just need to use it more often!
customer_reviews.author: Troy L. Hamby

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and has a good amount of space to run
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality treadmill. It's sturdy and has a good amount of space to run. It's really heavy and doesn't fold up very high, so don't plan on using the folding option. If you aren't planning on moving this treadmill often, then this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Lind

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchasing this treadmill. My primary concerns were that it wasn't going to fall apart after a few uses and that it wasn't going to be too loud. It was easy to put together with the simple instructions. My spouse and I both use it daily and I am very impressed at its sturdy build. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael L. Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Super Brand, Super pleased
customer_reviews.text: SOLE is quality fitness products! Still going strong! Great buy! Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great machine after fixed
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill didn't work when it arrived and we battled a bit with sole to get a technician out to our home in a timely manner. Their first in line tech would not return our calls but their second in line was amazing. We had to argue with sole to let us go with the second tech. A few weeks later the treadmill is working good. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lg

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup for mechanical person. Incredibly solid for any size person. Only flaw is that the back of the treadmill is not level. When you get it you will have to lower the back feet levelers all the way down to even get it close.
customer_reviews.author: MBAR

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: i only use it when my kids are asleep and it is super quiet. I'm amazed and extremely pleased. That was my biggest concern when researching them all but couldn't be happier with the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sole Fitness has excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited when it arrived. It was defective and did not work - belt did not run. It was a wiring problem. Sole Fitness has excellent customer service. They responded to my problem. Took about 2 weeks to finally get resolved. I love the treadmill. Great investment in physical fitness! It is quiet, smooth, and easy to use. It is quite heavy so when delivered, have help or purchase assembly if available. I assembled it myself, took about 90 minutes to 2 hrs. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super quiet and very comfortable deck. Has lots of variety in programs to keep your body guessing.
customer_reviews.author: T. B. Moulton

customer_reviews.title: Running strong after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: 2 months in and going strong. I had to upgrade from a lifespan 1200i as it didn't have the power I needed. At 275 lbs I burned out 3 motors thought add for it is rated to 300. I ve found that the companies don't seem to care their treadmills burn through mototrs or not. Thankfully I had a good service contract. Still the repair lag time left me without a TM for weeks at a pop and I finally broke down and went with this one. So far so. The Sole has comparable options to the lifespan but with considerably more power. This is a quality piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Local yokel

customer_reviews.title: Could not be more satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: The treadmill is very stable, with a strong and quiet motor, the deck has a good feel to it, and the extra wide running belt is great for someone like me who is a bit sloppy in my running form. In the past I have purchased two treadmills around the thousand dollar price range and they simply did not hold up to daily running. This treadmill feels as good as some of the gym treadmills I have ran on. For the money I do not think I could be happier with my purchase. For me it was certainly worth stepping up in price for this type of quality.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This is a great runners treadmill. I'm training for a marathon and on cold days I use it for my long runs. I've been using it for about two months and no issues as of yet. Assembly wasn't that bad but this thing is a beast. It's at least 230+ pounds. It doesn't have all the bells and whistles as the other treadmills but it contains everything you need to record your runs. The one thing I really like is the speed and elevation controls on handle bars. Low impact as well so no joint problems after my runs.
customer_reviews.author: BDAWG!

customer_reviews.title: Off to a great start!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, easy to assemble (by myself), everything works! Smooth and relatively quiet. Perfect so far (2 days). Had seen in another review that the fan is not adjustable, but it is (up and down).
customer_reviews.author: Juggler

customer_reviews.title: Sexy machine
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine. Has to be the sexiest treadmill on the market. Everything you could want in a machine, durable, easy to assemble, great price and looks awesome. Totally the machine you want if you're in the market for a higher end treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: KSW

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So quiet! Very happy with this purchase. Bought a treadmill for multiple users in our household, this model offers everything we need. One thing to note is that it is very heavy. I would not recommend trying to take to a second floor room.
customer_reviews.author: Rcowan1386

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This is the second F80 that we've purchased. It works extremely well, and goes as fast as we would need it. We sold our previous F80 because we were planning on downsizing, but once we got our house we purchased another. Very well put together and many miles put on the machine with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Yoshikawa

customer_reviews.title: so good for the product
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good for the product. The delivers complianed the box was to heavy and they delivered the box shredded to pieces. They complained about putting the 300 lb machine inside my house. They told me they were only paid to bring it to my door, but they would go ahead and help me. What a crock...
customer_reviews.author: John Fluker

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed the product
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the product. Some minor assembly issues and initial operations problems with the release to raise and lower the bed.
customer_reviews.author: L T

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this brand new treadmill on June 24th. ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand new treadmill on June 24th . After setting up treadmill we noticed that the incline function was not working. I contacted the company and they quickly sent out the parts needed to repair. It has now been 2 months and we are unable to get someone out to complete the repair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Treadmill!
customer_reviews.text: This works very well and even our teenagers love to exercise on it. It meets all our different needs and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bookaholic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent treadmill, I believe it is the best for the money. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. RN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: The first time it came, the package and plastic on the treadmill was broken and damaged. We sent it back. We had checked it before the truck left. Amazon was great about sending out a 2nd one. This one was good. It has worked well. It is nice looking and works as described. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: pensil2pen

customer_reviews.title: Quality Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This is as close to a gym-quality machine as you can get for under $3K.
customer_reviews.author: BenL

customer_reviews.title: Great Delivery and Great Product! I can always count on Amazon Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Product is a 5 star reliable item (so far) and I can see solid quality build in every aspect. It is an upgrade from my 6 years old treadmill. I don't have enough time spent on this Sole f80 treadmill to give a really valuable feedback. Everything is as expected. I have ordered this item before Christmas for my wife. At some point, the delivery date was shifted past Christmas day but Amazon really stepped in and helped me get this item on time with a slight 1-2 delay. Delivery guy (one man) loaded the treadmill and brought into my house. I couldn't ask for more. I am satisfied Amazon customer.
customer_reviews.author: PKJR

customer_reviews.title: Once again Sole hits it out of the park !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after purchasing their spin bike and the great customer service experience I had as well as a great recomendation from a co worker. Arrived as promised placed in my basement,assembly took two of us about an hour. Everything went smoothly and fit perfectly. I wanted a folding treadmill but they all felt flimsy. this is as solid as the commercial units at the gym and moves around so easy when folded. could not be happier with my Sole equipment, dont need the gym for anything now.
customer_reviews.author: Pitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great treadmill. ... very heavy. Shipping does not include set up. Delivery to front door only so beware.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill. Easy to use controls
customer_reviews.text: Great treadmill. Easy to use controls. Extra length & width a real plus for running.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Crossley

customer_reviews.title: This is a great treadmill and it arrived in wonderful condition with no ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great treadmill and it arrived in wonderful condition with no problem in assembly as it was easy to put together. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Dixon

customer_reviews.title: A Superb Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: This piece of exercise equipment is living up to its advertising, consumer and purchaser reviews completely.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Professor of Biochemistry

customer_reviews.title: Great Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this purchase. The treadmill is sturdy, and doesn't have the 'cheap' feel to it that some of the others have. Bring a friend to help carry it.....not a one-man job!
customer_reviews.author: JWhite

customer_reviews.title: Good machine!
customer_reviews.text: Basically I really like the treadmill. My only problem is the pulse bars are too low and a little too far forward, especially for a tall person. I am six foot three inches tall. Otherwise I would have given the machine a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is grat exactly what I was looking for. Will certainly add other machines to my at home gym!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Great treadmill. Used for three adults in the household and it accommodates us all from 5'4" to 6'3". Smooth and quiet. We bought the workout equipment mat to go underneath to protect the carpet. We have had it for three months so far and no issues at all. Took about 1-1/2 hours to put together because I (wife) misunderstood instructions and we had to redo (hubby ok now that it's done). Glad we spent the extra to get better warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Williams

customer_reviews.title: works great so far
customer_reviews.text: solid machine. works great so far. fast shipping right to our door. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Sole F80 Review Positive
customer_reviews.text: I spent yesterday putting my F80 together. Slight issue in that the instruction I received didn't match the parts. Luckily, it was easy to see the mistake and take the machine apart and install correctly. Used for the first time today and find the machine very functional. Also very quiet. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Wollan

customer_reviews.title: F-80 as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Best treadmill we've owned by far and we've owned several,is quiet and smooth heart rate is pretty accurate I would recommend this machine to anyone wanting a good home treadmill at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice treadmill, very solid, extremely heavy need 2 people minimum to move and assemble but worth the effort
customer_reviews.author: cr09491

customer_reviews.title: It was also easy to assemble once I got it into the house
customer_reviews.text: have not had it long but appears to be well made and durable. It was also easy to assemble once I got it into the house!! I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Byers

customer_reviews.title: The Sole F80 is so popular at this house one rainy Saturday we were arguing who would get it next.
customer_reviews.text: My whole family really likes Sole F 80. This last winter was brutal here in Michigan and we all run to some extent. So I broke down and got the F 80 with my refund check. The only reason I marked it down one star is because of assembly. I felt that they could have designed it better so that one person could put it together. My wife or my son had to hold parts while I put bolts or screws in. I put things together all the time bye myself. Last when they say its heavy believe it.
customer_reviews.author: David E Shuler

customer_reviews.title: I love this treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I love this treadmill. It's like having one of the gym's treadmills at home. It's great quality, it's very quiet, and very sturdy. It was also very easy to assemble and disassemble when we moved. I would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: A&P

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: im using it for 6 months and still works as if its brand new. i run 5 times a day, 50 min, 3.5 speed @ 15% incline. highly recomended
customer_reviews.author: Straw

customer_reviews.title: High quality durable treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for just a week and it's been perfect! This is a very high quality treadmill and worth every dollar. It was easy to assemble but took a little bit of time - 2 hrs. I plan to use this 1.0 mile in the morning before going to work and 1.5 mile in the evening after work. This cuts down jogging in the elements and much more convenient. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: We love our new Sole Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: We love our new Sole Treadmill! It is everything go we hoped for. A little big for our space, but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Katy P

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Feels just like the gym mills. I've seen other reviews about code issues and break downs, must have gotten a bad unit from the get go...Hope I dont have those issues. Im 250 lbs and the unit laughs like, bring it! All in all, this machine is heavy duty and is made for serious workouts. Havfun!
customer_reviews.author: Wideguyz

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth every dollar! I've invested in treadmills for years and the Sole F80 is by far the best one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great Treadmill for the money. Very sturdy just like the ones at the gym and lots of different program settings.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Haass

customer_reviews.title: Runs Like a Champ (no pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, that's for sure. Had to take the parts out of the box and carry up about 14 steps. Didn't need any excercise after that! Easy assembly, most important part to take care of is the initial electrical pair-up on the right side. Took less about one and a half hours for one person to set up. Runs pretty quiet and as advertised. So far, so good --- no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: D Dunn

customer_reviews.title: pretty darn good...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, very smooth and quiet. But I'm short (5'2") and the heart rate handles seem very low even for me. When at an incline I feel like I have to bend over to use them which makes my back hurt. Also wish the distance had one more decimal place. It only goes to 1.2 instead of 1.25. Just small issues though considering how well it runs.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Great Treadmill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and I. I did a lot of research before buying and glad I did. This is high quality and love the features that come with this. We both use this twice a day and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fortuna

customer_reviews.title: mostly satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality treadmill for home. I mostly like the running surface and easy control. Also very easy to fold. The only problem, which is very significant for me since I'm also walking sometimes, that front handles are very low for me even I'm only 5.2ft. So if you trying walking and holding onto front handles especially during incline, it is impossible, unless you want to bend. You only could hold side handles. This problem is only significant when you want to use front handles. If you only run or don't mind to use side handles than its fine. Otherwise I'm very satisfied with quality of treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is built solid. I am 6', 210 lbs and when running, it does not move. Solid frames, solid tread, nice cushioning of the treadmill. We just got it set up, which is relatively easy. That process took an hour or two. It comes with a heart rate monitor which is an added bonus. One important thing. The treadmill weighs 315 lbs, and is 8 feet long. It is incredibly bulky and it is not a one person job to move it around. One negative. Some of the buttons look pretty light weight and that may become a problem later. All in all, very nice to run on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael MacEachern

customer_reviews.title: Very nice treadmill!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for a week but I was pleasantly surprised at how stable and well built it is. It is comparable to those treadmills that I have used in gyms. I am very pleased with the purchase and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: K. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Gym quality! We have had ours for about a month and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: I like the TT8 very much
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent me the wrong treadmill... They sent the TT8 light commercial version instead. It does not fold, but it is a more valuable treadmill so I am not too mad about the situation. Plan ahead to have some strong friends help you bring the thing inside your house. It is huge, durable, and very heavy. I like the TT8 very much. I am sure the F80 would have been great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin McGurty

customer_reviews.title: ... in power and put tether strap in Now the fun..
customer_reviews.text: Brand new out of box Takes about 30 mins to setup Few bolts and screws Plug 3 cables in Plug in power and put tether strap in Now the fun.... Will not power up Call SOLE They say it could be pinched wired. Parts will come in a week or more Sending tech out. So so far not impressed Next day air and Tech ASAP would have got 3 stars. This gets 1 star for a out of box issue and bad customer service.
customer_reviews.author: tester

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely reccomend this treadmill to anyone. It is very solid. The only 2 things I would change are the water bottle holer location and the fan strength.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE - Broke after only 3 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This treadmill was great for the three months it worked. Then, in the middle of a workout, it stopped working entirely. I called the company and they told me might take a week or two to get service, which I told them wasn't acceptable as I use my treadmill daily. Then they told me they would overnight the parts and have a service company call within 24 hrs and schedule service. Neither if those things happened. So here I am with a three month old, broken treadmill that I can no longer use. Very angry and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine for the buck, Only took 30 min to install , i looked for 3 months for tread mills and by far this is the one .
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine for the buck, Only took 30 min to install , i looked for 3 months for tread mills and by far this is the one .The biggest thing on this tread mill that i found is the warranty package they offer. Check it out
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from it. After assembling tried to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from it. After assembling tried to use for the first time and got error LS1. Got the same result after a few tries. I don't expect the treadmill to fail even before first use. Trying to get full refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Villagomez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just make sure you have a friend or two handy to get it set where you want it. This thing is heavy!
customer_reviews.author: B Pierson

customer_reviews.title: It's fine if you move back
customer_reviews.text: Hand rails not long enough. if you use the hand rails to steady yourself while walking, you kick the front of the machine. It's fine if you move back, but then you can't reach the hand rails. I'm 5'11". Probably good for running, since most people don't hold on when jogging. So fustrated, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: christian b wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Not impressed by the fact that this does ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Not impressed by the fact that this does not become fully flat while running. There is a small minimum incline "ALWAYS". You get used to it, but I'd like a $1800 treadmill to be able to do this. Apparently treadmills which go to the fully flat configuration are more prone to mechanical wear, but for $1800 I expect that reliability. Apart from that, the treadmill is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Vishnu Raghav

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Amazon service!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but getting it is painful. Amazon only pays for curb side delivery so a single delivery guy can drops 500+ lbs box by curbside then a single technician comes to install and expects that super heavy box to be carried to the room to be installed. Terrible organization. Trust me it's so heavy that you need easily 3 men to carry that thing. It was a disaster and each time only one person was scheduled to come for the service therefore I couldn't even tip and ask for extra help. It's a lesson for me I will not buy any heavy item/furniture etc from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: FERAH C.

customer_reviews.title: I hate this treadmill it was very hard to assemble i ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate this treadmill it was very hard to assemble i had it my garage and decided to move it in doors only to find out how heavy and bulky it is, doesn't fit through any of my doors you have to take it part to get it to fit, also not enough support for running the surface is hard and the speaker gave out soon after i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great treadmill. Very good at collecting dust
customer_reviews.text: Great treadmill. Very good at collecting dust. Sometimes I like to write love notes in the dust, on the screen, with my finger, for my wife. Maybe someday she will see them if she every decides to work off that baby weight.
customer_reviews.author: IagainstI

product_meta.title: Sole Fitness F80 Folding Treadmill
product_meta.description:
The F80 treadmill steps up to a leading warranty and the Cushion Flex Whisper Deck, shown in a study to reduce impact up to 40-Percent (.365-.400) as compared to running on asphalt. The strong 3.0 Cont. Duty HP motor delivers challengins speeds up to 12 MPH and inclines up to 15-Percent. When not in use the deck safely locks into place, 100-Percent secure. Other safety features include a large stop switch, low profile running hood, and a starting speed of 0.5 mph. Additional features include cooling fans, speed and incline controls on the handlebars, and built in speakers to hook up MP3 players, Ipod, etc for easy listening.

AMAZON.COM
The SOLE F80 treadmill offers an industry-leading warranty and a proprietary Cushion Flex Whisper Deck, shown in a study to reduce impact on your joints by up to 40% compared to running on asphalt. A strong, 3.5 continuous duty HP motor delivers challenging speeds up to 12 MPH and inclines up to 15%. For added convenience and space savings when not in use, the treadmill deck folds and locks into place. Enjoy six preset programs, two customizable workout programs, two heart rate programs, and other safety features include a large stop switch, starts from only 0.5 mph and low-profile running hood. 

 A vibrant LED display includes a message board for clear instruction and feedback. The information that is displayed at all times includes Speed, Incline, Time, Distance Traveled, Calories, Pulse and Pace, and there is also a 1/4 mile track feature and a Peak and Valley graph for different programs. The console also has built in speakers which allow you to hook up any MP3 player to listen to your favorite playlist during your workout. 

 Technology


 * Folding Deck: The design features a patented all gear rack and pinion system with a Safety Lock Deck that locks the deck into place when the treadmill is in the upright position. The F80 also comes with an Easy Assist Folding Deck Design, which allows you to release the deck, step back, and the deck will unfold itself silently while you watch. 
 * Convenient Controls: A streamlined control console features quick speed and incline adjustment buttons along the sides of the LCD for in-workout adjustment convenience. 
 * Cushion Flex Whisper Deck: Proprietary stealth technology provides a comfortable, quiet workout while reducing impact by up to 40%. 
 * Precision Welded Frame: The durable, solidly-built frame is strong enough to handle repeated use by users of all weights and heights. 
 * SOLE LCD Display: A vibrant blue screen with large, clean readouts provide users with helpful information, including heart rate, speed, pace, calories burned, and other useful bits of information. 
 * Integrated Message Board: An alphanumeric text center sends scrolling messages to the user in an effort to guide them through all of the details of every workout. The message board will also recap your entire workout after you are finished, so you can see your progress. 
 * High Torque Motor with Flywheels: All SOLE treadmills feature the heaviest duty chassis and motors in their class. Features include powder-coated, all-steel welded frames and heavy duty stable inclines, industrial quality motors with large diameter, all-steel zinc coated balanced flywheels for a vibration-free secure running/walking surface. 
 * Rollers: 2.75-inch rollers have a sealed bearing design and copper ground wires for each roller to reduce static. Larger rollers make for a larger contact surface against the belt and longer roller and belt life. 
 * Belts: Woven two-ply belts with four layers, including two rubber layers over a middle PVC layer with a nylon backing that rolls over the deck and rollers. The rubber provides the durability, the PVC stops the belt from over-stretching, and the nylon provides a smooth, static-free surface to glide over the deck and rollers. 

 Dimensions


 * Measures 35 by 58 by 80 inches (W x H x D) 
 * Deck measures 35 by 80 inches (W x D) 
 * Running surface measures 22 by 60 inches (W x D) 
 * 265-pound weight 
 * 375-pound weight limit 
 * 2.75-inch rollers 

 Controls & Features


 * 3.5 CHP, DC Type motor 
 * 0.5-to-12 MPH speed range 
 * 0-to-15% rack-and-pinion gear design incline 
 * Two-ply belt 
 * Pulse grip and chest strap heart rate monitoring 
 * Six standard programs 
 * Two custom programs 
 * Two heart programs 
 * Cooling fans 
 * MP3-compatible sound system 
 * 7.5-inch LCD workout display 

 Warranties
This piece of SOLE equipment includes the following manufacturer's warranties against defects in materials and workmanship:


 * Frame, motor, and deck: Lifetime 
 * Electronics: Five years 
 * Labor: Two years
feature_bullets: F80 treadmill offers an industry-leading warranty and a proprietary Cushion Flex Whisper Deck, shown in a study to reduce impact on your joints by up to 40% compared to running on asphalt
3.5 CHP, DC Type motor with 0.5-to-12 MPH speed range, 0-to-15% rack-and-pinion gear design incline, two-ply belt, pulse grip and chest strap heart rate monitoring
Six standard programs, two custom programs, and two heart programs; cooling fans and MP3-compatible sound system; 7.5-inch LCD workout display
Measures 35 by 58 by 80 inches (W x H x D); deck measures 35 by 80 inches (W x D); running surface measures 22 by 60 inches (W x D); 265-pound weight and 375-pound weight limit; 2.75-inch rollers
Includes the following manufacturer's warranties against defects in materials and workmanship: lifetime on frame, motor, and deck; five years on electronics; and two years on labor
